interestingcomments.content: @theodor: For Mark, they should place the personal engraving INSIDE the camera so he can see it from time to time ;-)) ... or, while we're at it, perhaps a one-off special with a clear polycarbonate body which could find a place on Mark's mantlepiece so that he could peruse the internal organs without having to deconstruct it. --img-- (On second thought, perhaps this would appeal more to Damien Hurst. --img-- )
